location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to His Highness Maharajah Juswant [Jaswunt] Singh, Bhurtpore [Bharatpur]

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledging receipt of his letter of 21 September; expressing his gladness on hearing that the Maharajah is in good health and his hope that they shall meet soon.The letter also gives Pelly's apologies for the inconvenience caused by having Petitions sent to the Maharajah which were later rescinded.
